amendment.description: An amendment numbered 205 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase funding for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas (HIDTA) by $6 million with an offset from the IRS Enforcement account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jenkins (WV) amendment (A167) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jenkins (WV) amendment (A167) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A167) offered by Mr. Jenkins (WV).
